page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: AT 0730 ROBERT GETS UP AND TAKES A SHOWER. THEN AFTER GETTING CASUALLY DRESSED FOR SCHOOL, HE HAS BREAKFAST AT AROUND 0800. THIS CONSISTS OF CEREAL (FROSTIES OR RICE CRISPIES), TOAST AND A CUP OF COFFEE. DURING THIS HE WATCHES BREAKFAST TELEVISION OR LISTENS TO RADIO 1. AT 0830 HE LEAVES TO CATCH THE SCHOOL BUS WHICH DEPARTS AT 0845. HE ARRIVES AT GLENROTHES HIGH SCHOOL AT APPROXIMATELY 0855. SCHOOL STARTS AT 0900 AND FINISHES AT 1600 WITH A COUPLE OF BREAKS IN BETWEEN (ie 1050 - 1105;1300 - 1400). HE ARRIVES HOME AT ABOUT 1615 AND IMMEDIATELY GETS CHANGED AND MAKES HIS BED. PRECEDING DINNER AT 1700 (WHICH IS A LIGHT SNACK) HE EITHER WATCHES TELEVISION OR PLAYS GOLF IN A NEARBY FIELD. AFTER DINNER ROBERT MAY HAVE TO PARTAKE IN WASHING THE DISHES. (CONT)
